Hello everybody! There staff is able to play the following!

1 - Download & Install Demo
2 - Download & Install FM 13 complete version (can be from this site)
3 - Open FM 13 (full version)
4 - Start a new game
5 - On screen were you are adding new manager save the game
6 - Go to "Documents / Sports Interactive / Football Manager 2013/games /" and change the extension of your save from. "Fm" to. "QFM"
7 - Open FM 13 DEMO
8 - New Career - Quick stars
9 - Find your save-file
10 - Open and play

2 - Download & Install FM 13 complete version (can be from this site)
3 - Open FM 13 (full version)
4 - Start a new game
5 - On screen were you are adding new manager save the game
6 - Go to "Documents / Sports Interactive / Football Manager 2013/games /" and change the extension of your save from. "Fm" to. "QFM"

8 - New Career - Quick stars
9 - Find your save-file

Hi People, hi have discover a way to play football manager and is realy simple.

You Need
Football Manager 2013 realese skidrow and cracked
Football Manager 2013 Demo

As you know the crack is not fully function, but you can manage to play i gona explain.

1- Install Football Manager 2013 of skidrow and crack it
2 -  Open that football manager and start a regular new game and select all the leagues you want to play, and add a new manager(you)
3- save the game (do not go further in game create and save)
4-  go to your documents folder and put the saved game on you desktop
5- Install steam and download fm13 demo and install it
6- put your save one fm13 demo folder on games folder and reaname it to xxx.qfm
7-  run the fm13 demo and load your save as a quick start
8 - enjoy (now you have the full database and full game the only diference is that you cant add a new manager or add a new league so make sure you add the leagues on your new game)
So Team skidrow the amateurs are more eficient that you... Peace
